subject: Education (K-12)
Tennis
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: The boys’ team at Beacon School in Manhattan won a national high school championship despite enduring long commutes for court space, a problem for many public high school players in New York City.
snippet: The boys’ team at Beacon School in Manhattan won a national high school championship despite enduring long commutes for court space, a problem for many public high school players in New York City.
